This article or section contains information about a scheduled future release or update.
The information is subject to change. As the wiki is not a crystal ball, this article should consist only of facts included in official Jagex releases and not speculation.
Heavily contested area

Due to the small amount of Bounty Hunter worlds, it is common for 1 account to trap the emblem trader deep in the Revenant Caves. Attempting to interact with the emblem trader here will result the account attacking you and the possiblity of several other accounts logging in to spec-trade you.

It does not take user inputs, but it does use changing prices from the Grand Exchange Market Watch. If prices appear to be outdated, [ purge the page by clicking here].

is a temporary piece of content found only in unrestricted worlds.

The contents of this page refer to a piece of content only available on temporary unrestricted worlds as a means to test it before release. Its design is subject to change, and the graphics are used as a placeholder.
This topic name is not found in-game.
While the name or title of this topic is not officially recognised in-game, the information contained on this page is still considered to be canon and is based on official sources.
This article contains information only featured in Postbag from the Hedge.

Postbags released during the RuneScape 2 era (2005-07) are generally not considered canon, unless otherwise mentioned. Postbags released during the Old School era (since 2021) are generally considered canon.
This article has a calculator |here.
Calculators determine experience and costs based on real-time prices from the Grand Exchange Market Watch.
This article contains information about a subject known only to exist in the game APIs or cache.
The content is not known to be accessible in game, or may be reserved for use in a future update.
This article contains information only featured in Lores and Histories.
Lores and Histories are generally considered canon, unless directly conflicting with in-game lore, in which case the latter has precedence.
The methods in this guide may involve considerable risk
Risks including, but not limited to: loss of money/items, unstable prices, and/or slow GE resale. Test sales and prices with small amounts. Use this method at your own risk.
This dynamic calculator requires JavaScript.
This page takes user input via JavaScript and may use changing prices from the Grand Exchange Market Watch.

If you die here, you will not lose any of your items, including those stored inside an Item Retrieval Service (deathbank).

This page is about an approved third-party Old School RuneScape client.

Using this specific third-party client is not a bannable offence. However, using third-party clients that are not on Jagex's approved list is a bannable offence. Always use third-party clients at your own risk. The wiki does not endorse any particular third-party client.

This article has skill training guides:
Skill training guides document optimal XP/hour methods to train a skill, as well as alternate passive or less expensive methods.
The official OSBuddy client is no longer approved nor available.
Do not trust download links claiming to be related to OSBuddy, as these lead to fake clients used by scammers.

Boosting in is a bannable offence.
